questionTitle: I'm sorry, I haven't got ________ change. Why don't you try the bank?
Ford is one of the most popular ________ of car in Britain.
I must ________ shopping tomorrow as we have no food in the house.
I can't see any easy ________ to this rather complicated problem.
The other day I came ________ a really beautiful old house in the back streets of Birmingham.
I can't find my handbag anywhere; it has simply ________.
Scientists have discovered a close ________ between smoking and several serious diseases.
She came in quietly ________ not to wake the baby.
He decided to ________ a party to celebrate his birthday.
I have absolutely no doubt ________ the innocence of the accused.
Everybody ________ me for the accident.
Tommorow they are going to see the works ________ Van Gogh.
I consulted my lawyer ________ the matter and I shall act on his advice.
I'm afraid he didn't enjoy ________ at his aunt's house.
There are ________ when I have to work very hard.
Peter, ________ by the repeated rejections of his novel, ________ to submit his manuscrip to other publishers.
When she heard the bad news, she hit the ________.

It has been ________ that environment is the ________ factor in the incidence of drug addiction, but recent studies with twins separated at birth indicate that a predisposition to addiction can be inherited.
If the phone ________ she would rush to answer it.
The three friends all ________ for the same job.
